skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flying beast clothes changer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Flying Beast Clothes Changer is a formula by the very amazing Gaurav Taneja a.k.a Flying Beast! Talk to this skill to decide if you need to change your shorts and shirt depending on the time since your last shower. 

Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ij01pV6Vrzw
Author: Gaurav Taneja a.k.a Flying Beast
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
